alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:56PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 330 PM MST... At 255 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gu Vo, or 27 miles southeast of Ajo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gu Vo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Pia Oik, Santa Cruz, Kuakatch and San Simon West. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 61 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
